name: TEN (itch)
description:
This is TEN. The successor of the non-award winning, non-ground-breaking but hard af game Eleven from 2020s LD47 addition.

TEN comes with never seen before 3D graphics and levels. Sounds, traps and obstacles that let you feel the old atmosphere of its predecessor!

In TEN you’re challenged again to find Keycards and Levers to open Doors and such. The newly-created absolutely epic 3D environment will keep you on your toes while you’re trying your best in these !sic parkour areas.

Oh, before we forget! This is a successor of an already loved (by us) game, so we even implemented Controller support!

Features everywhere!

Will you reach the cake at the end, or will you fail!?

Controls
  • Mouse - Look around
  • WASD - Move
  • E - Interact
  • R - Place Checkpoint
  • ESC - Pause / UnPause the Game 

THERE IS CONTROLLER SUPPORT!

Disclaimer
  •  MAC and LINUX version are not tested
  •  This game is beatable and can be played through
Known Issues
  •  Many Sounds / Music are not implemented
  •  The end of the game is currently not totally obvious :/
